name: THE SFU ANIME EXPERIENCE
description:
HAVE YOU EVER WANTED TO FIND OUT WHAT ITS REALLY LIKE TO BE A REAL STUDENT AT SFU WHO'S ALSO A FILTHY WEEB? WELL NOW YOU CAN!

SFU ANIME PUBLISHING LLC BRINGS YOU THIS REVOLUTIONARY NEW GAME!

UPDATE: AUDIO HAS BEEN DISCOVERED AND ADDED TO FURTHER ENHANCE PLAYER IMMERSION!

please note that this product is in early access and may not necessarily represent the final product. SFU Anime publishing LLC offers no guarantee that a finalized version of this product will ever be released and this early access version is offered "as is". Additionally, SFU Anime is not responsible for any potential damages to hardware or software or lost passwords that may occur as a result of attempting to run this game.
